summary: This code appears to be a comment expressing frustration with the inability of overlay filesystems to control their size. It suggests that users should stop expecting this feature from overlay and instead find alternative solutions.

details.comment: This code appears to be a comment expressing frustration with the inability of overlay filesystems to control their size. It suggests that users should stop expecting this feature from overlay and instead find alternative solutions.
details.content:
cat /proc/filesystems
do not expect for overlay. it cannot control the size. just fuck off please?
